actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of expenditures by farmers for clearing land.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions which permit farmers to elect to treat expenditures for clearing farm land as currently deductible business expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of expenditures by farmers for clearing land.
